brewery.name: BJ's Restaurant and Brewery
brewery.description:
To brew consistently great beer in a variety of ale and lager styles. That's really what BJ's beer is all about.

At BJ's we recognize that brewing is both an art and a science.

We also respect the vast variety of beer styles that the world has to offer - from the delicate balance of German Kolsch to the robust intensity of Russian Imperial Stout.

Our Passionate and talented team of brewers strives toward one simple goal: to brew consistently great beer in a variety of ale and lager styles. That's really what BJ's beer is all about.

brewery.name: Hofbräuhaus
brewery.description: The Hofbräuhaus am Platzl, Munich's famous “hofbrauhaus” was founded in 1589 by the Duke of Bavaria, Wilhelm V. It is one of Munich's oldest beer halls. It was originally founded as the brewery to the old Royal Residence, which at that time was situated just around the corner from where the beer hall stands today. The beer quickly became world famous thanks to the first brewer, Heimeran Pongratz, and the famous "Bavarian Beer Purity Law" of 1516 that stated that only natural ingredients could be used in the brewing process. In fact, the beer became so famous that it once saved the city from annihilation. When King Gustavus Adolphus of Sweden invaded Bavaria during the Thirty Years' War in 1632, he threatened to sack and burn the entire city of Munich. He agreed to leave the city in peace if the citizens surrendered some hostages, and 600,000 barrels of Hofbräuhaus beer.

brewery.name: Hop Nuts
brewery.description: Hop Nuts Brewing will be bringing craft beer to The Downtown Las Vegas Arts District in February, 2015. We are the first Microbrewery in the Arts District and are proud to say it! Our goal is to provide locals and tourists alike with a unique craft beer experience in a relaxed atmosphere. Whether you want to sit at our one of a kind bar or out on our patio and enjoy the weather while you enjoy your beer, we’ll leave that to you!

brewery.name: PT's Brewing Company
brewery.description: PT's Brewing Company is a local Las Vegas brewery and gaming bar. We brew seven of our own craft beers as well as serve an array of other craft beers.

brewery.name: Buckbean Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Buckbean Brewing Company — the first package brewery in Western Nevada and the second of three in the Silver State — began operations in a new 7,600-square-foot facility in Reno, NV in April 2008. Buckbean Brewing Company debuted with two styles of beer in 16 oz. cans, which has now grown to three, but also offers different styles on tap. The brewery houses a tasting room and offers guided tours free of charge.

Buckbean Brewing Company is the vision of Reno native Douglas S. Booth and Veteran brewmaster Daniel B. Kahn. These two self described “beer junkies” joined up in 2004 to create a new kind of microbrew appealing to both male and female beer drinkers.

brewery.name: Brasserie St. James
brewery.description: We make beers for all palates. A lot of our beers have been lovingly referred to as so finely crafted that they seem to be made for a serious wine drinkers palate. A saying goes in wine making, "it takes a lot of good beer to make good wine...". The point being, we make complex, delicate, nuanced beers, not just the same typical west coast hop bombs or dark extremely high alcohol brews (though we make quality versions of those too). Our goal is to show the whole spectrum of beer, its history, and its evolution. To show beer its proper reverence, as not only "The people's beverage", but one that pairs as well with food as wine, and when it's skillfully crafted and not over hopped to hide the flaws in production, it does. The truth is, it takes more skill to make a delicate lager, than a double IPA. You would be hard pressed to find anyone more passionate and knowledgeable about beer than myself or my brewer Josh Watterson. We welcome you to come down to our weekly brewery tours, and discuss all things beer, food, wine, or whatever be the topic of the day!

brewery.name: Bad Beat Brewing
brewery.description: Bad Beat Brewing was created on the premise that quality should be above all else. It's not about how much you brew, or how much you sell. It's about the beer; how satisfying it is and how much it makes people crave more. It's about taking what's good and making it better, while leaving what doesn't work behind you. Making it in the beer world isn't a gamble, it's a game of skill. At Bad Beat Brewing we play to drink, and drink to win.

brewery.name: Tonopah Brewing Co
brewery.description: Brewpub with a Bavarian 10 barrel system, carrying 11 beers on tap all brewed on premises.

brewery.name: Alibi Ale Works
brewery.description: Alibi Ale Works a craft brewery located in Incline Village, NV on the North Shore of Lake Tahoe. We are producing a wide range of beers with pure Lake Tahoe water, and our goal is to keep your taste buds intrigued with diverse and interesting flavors.

brewery.name: IMBĪB Custom Brews
brewery.description: IMBĪB Custom Brews is a brewery experience like no other. Imbibe means to receive into the mind and retain and we invite you to imbibe our beer by joining us in our taproom for tasters, pints, or growlers. We specialize in old-world barrel aged beers, but also have a variety of malty, hoppy, and easy drinking brews to meet the expectations of every beer lover. We want to engage our customers on a deeper level which is why we offer a membership club, custom recipe project, and educational experiences.

brewery.name: Boulder Dam Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Our beers are 100% natural - no additives or preservatives. 
Because we choose to not filter our beers, you may notice a slight beer haze… fear not!

Boulder City brewery, just outside of Las Vegas NV.

brewery.name: Banger Brewing Company
brewery.description: We are a microbrewery located on Fremont Street in Downtown Las Vegas.  We feature a tap tasting room with free tours, growler fills, and beer flights

data.name: Main Brewery
data.hoursOfOperation:
Daily: 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 a.m.
Closed on Independence Day, Thanksgiving and Christmas.

brewery.name: Tenaya Creek Brewery
brewery.description: Tenaya Creek was established in 1999 by Tim Etter and his brothers and sisters. Tim's background in brewing started in his college days at the University of Utah in Salt Lake City. In early 1993, his roommate at the time introduced him to the art of making beer. This smalltime hobby of making beer in a tiny apartment blossomed into a fulltime career, brewing commercially. Towards the end of 1993, Tim attended UC Davis in Northern California to study Fermentation Science. Upon returning to Salt Lake, he aligned himself with a startup brewery called Uinta Brewing Company. The concept for this startup was to brew the freshest beer available in the State of Utah while limiting the alcohol percentage to 3.2 by weight (4% by volume). It was wildly successful, providing locally made beer for the ski areas and the many tourists that visited Utah.

brewery.name: Revision Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Revision Brewing was founded on the principal of having an evolutionary spirit.  Add to this our respect for craft beer and the result is the quality you get with a Revision Brewing Company beer.

“Respect craft beer” refers to a genuine appreciation for all aspects of the craft beer culture:  passion, process, ingredients, people, and of course the beer itself.

brewery.name: CraftHaus Brewery
brewery.description: Our production brewery and taproom are located 12 minutes from the Las Vegas Strip. CraftHaus Brewery's foundation is built on quality beer and a commitment to community. Enjoy and share: it's time well spent.

brewery.name: Plan 9 Brewing
brewery.description:
Plan 9 Brewing Co is a Las Vegas start up brewery focusing on specialty brews in smaller batches, with a belief that smaller is better. A care and dedication to the craft beer market.

Plan 9 Brewing Co is founded by Brew Master Steve who garnered his love of beer while living in England. The history of beer there was a true draw for Steve who studied the styles of Southern England to see how they differed from the rest of the world, and its that education that influences all of Plan 9 Brewing’s styles. Melding old world beer with the new world mentality.

Plan 9 Brewing Co will be bringing you on tap services to local area bars as well as 22 oz ‘bombers’ to select retailers.

brewery.name: Old School Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Brew pub and family restaurant in west Las Vegas. 
Pizzas, sandwiches, entrees, full bar, gaming machines and fresh made beer from our 15 barrel brewery.  Tours welcome.

brewery.name: Stoneyhead Brewing Co.
brewery.description: We are a Reno Brewery Company with a great selection of delicious microbrew ranging from our dark porter to our honey pale ale.

brewery.name: Silver Peak Brewery And Restaurant
brewery.description:
The Silver Peak Restaurant and Brewery was born from a friendship and a dream. We came up with the concept in the late 80?s, about seven years after we met.
We’d been talking about opening a business together for years. We eventually narrowed the field down to the idea of an upscale, modern-version of the classic brewpub. Then in 1991 the idea became a goal. That goal was to create a unique place in Reno; a restaurant and brewery where the service was as good as the food and the beer was worth coming back for; a place where locals could meet friends after work, or treat their dates and clients to original and delicious dishes.

brewery.name: Sin City Beer Company
brewery.description: Sin City Brewing Co. is a Las Vegas-based microbrewery launched by long-time Gordon Biersch Director of Brewing Operations Richard Johnson. Produced to satisfy both the microbrew savvy drinker and those with a preference for a traditional domestic style beer, Sin City beers accentuate the indulgent nature of Las Vegas. The beers are brewed in small batches (100 kegs at a time) using traditional methods, premium raw materials and a strict adherence to the Rheinheitsgebot, the 1516 German beer purity law that differentiates Sin City beers from the big guys. Sin City beers are brewed and distributed exclusively in Las Vegas.Sin City Brewing Co. also features a popular retail line that is available through its online store and its branded microbrew bars at Miracle Mile Shops, The Grand Canal Shoppes and Flamingo Las Vegas.

brewery.name: Pigeon Head Brewery
brewery.description: Production brewery specializing in Lagers and fine Seasonal Ales founded in 2014 in the Old Brewery District of Reno, Nevada.

brewery.name: Battle Born Beer Company
brewery.description:
Let’s face it. Most beer is pretty damn good.

Sure, we’ll argue about which one we think is best.  But in the grand scheme of things, how much better can you make something that should only have about four ingredients?

That’s the way we see it anyway.

People who only want the best beer will always be looking for it.  We’d rather just sell good beer to people who believe what we believe.

Battle Born personifies those beliefs.

So while everyone else tries to invent the next pumpkin nut brown ale, we figure we’d keep it simple and build a great brand.

After all, it’s just beer.

brewery.name: Chicago Brewing Company
brewery.description: Award winning brewpub featuring a selection of appetizers, pizzas, sandwiches and entrees along with a fully stocked gaming bar. Beer is brewed on premise and has won numerous awards at the Great American Beer Festival and The World Beer Cup.

brewery.name: Brew Brothers Brewery
brewery.description: Named Best Brewpub in America by Nightclub & Bar magazine, The Brew Brothers offers eight custom microbrews and a creative menu, including gourmet wood-fired pizzas, salads, burgers, ribs, sandwiches, homemade soups and complete dinners. The Brew Brothers Reno brewery was also voted “Best Microbrew, “Best Beer Selection,” and “Best Live Music” in the Best of Reno poll and was named the highest selling brewpub in North America. Catch live bands and DJs nightly.

brewery.name: The Depot
brewery.description: Our mission at The Depot is to share our pursuit and passion for transforming base ingredients into far more noble forms. Whether creating our spirits, beer or food, we subscribe to the theory that with care and passion, our craft offerings can be greater than the sum of their simple parts.  Reaching such lofty goals usually comes from experimentation with a foundation of quality ingredients and process knowledge.  Our production spaces were designed with this in mind, allowing our imaginations to run wild and offering endless possibilities to perfect our craft. With an eye toward local sourcing, quality, and the creation of products both traditional and innovative, we tender our goods to our neighbors near and far in the hope to bring an exceptional craft experience.

brewery.name: Great Basin Brewing Company
brewery.description: Great Basin Brewing Co. makes fresh hand-crafted beer right before your eyes using the finest American & European grains, hops & yeast. The rugged beauty and free spirit of this region have inspired the creation of the brewery and the beers that you enjoy. We invite you to celebrate our heritage with us.
